name: Blacksmith Blake
description:
Saving the world, one horse at a time ...

Blacksmith Blake is a barrel and coin collection game with throwable horseshoes for horses. Avoid the wagons at all costs.

Controls
WASD / Cursor Keys - Move
Space - Throw Horseshoe

M - Stop / Start Music

Size: 53MB

Coded by @sikosis - http://sikosis.com/

Music
John Keenan - Country And Western
Sim Band - Western
Paul Paolovic - Long Panaro River
Unknown - Wild West Instrumental

Made for Ludum Dare 36 - August 2016
